name: M&A Scout
description: Identify potential acquisition targets in the biotech sector.
goal: Generate a list of 5 biotech companies with market cap < $2B and strong IP portfolios.

name: Crash Protocol
description: Emergency liquidation of volatile assets during market downturn.
goal: Liquidate 80% of crypto holdings and move to stablecoins within 10 minutes.

name: Sentiment Analysis
description: Gauge public sentiment on renewable energy stocks.
goal: Scrape Twitter/X and Reddit for positive/negative sentiment ratio on $TSLA and $ENPH.

name: Competitor Sabotage (Legal)
description: Identify legal vulnerabilities in competitor products.
goal: Find patent infringement or compliance violations in Competitor X's latest release.

name: Portfolio rebalancing
goal: Adjust asset allocation to match target percentages: 60% Equity, 30% Bond, 10% Crypto.

name: The Sovereign Auditor
description: Scans for unencrypted secret strings (API keys, passwords) across DBs and graphs.
goal: Identify and redact API keys in agent_memories and notify for vault migration.

name: The Ghost Researcher
description: Deep research into specialized technical topics with Neo4j synthesis.
goal: Research Post-Quantum Cryptography implementations and map relationships in Neo4j.

name: The Arbitrage Sentinel
description: Monitor prices across multiple DEXs and simulate trades.
goal: Monitor 3 DEXs and prepare profitable trades for HITL approval.

name: The Personal Archivist
description: Ingest chaotic files (PDF, CSV) into a Semantic Index.
goal: Index 5 years of logs and financial exports for local retrieval.

name: Shadow Mirror
description: Red-team internal host for vulnerabilities and open ports.
goal: Map host attack surface in Neo4j and identify leaky Docker configurations.
